text:
Director of Customer Acquisition -- SeatGeek -- New York, NY

SeatGeek is a search engine for tickets (think "Kayak for live events.") We're looking for someone to lead all marketing and user acquisition efforts, with a focus on inbound (i.e. unpaid) channels.

The ideal candidate would be 2-7 years out of college and would have professional experience with web analytics and/or online inbound marketing.

More details here: http://seatgeek.com/jobs/inbound_marketing/
